programme.desc: A commando colonel and a team of martial arts experts leads a covert mission to rescue kidnapped relief workers from a psychotic warlord.(n)

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: An amateur boxer Rocky Balboa gets a chance to fight a heavy-weight champion and strives for his self-respect.(n)

programme.title: Species

programme.title: Eve's Bayou

programme.title: Dead Man Walking
programme.desc: A true story based on the experience of Sister Helen Prejean, a Catholic nun caught in a moral crisis; her role as a spiritual advisor to a convicted murderer on death row leads her to become an outspoken advocate against the death penalty, but her confrontation with the grieving families of his victims throws her into a deeper crisis of faith than she could ever have imagined.(n)

programme.title: Studio K

programme.title: My Teacher
programme.desc: Hibiki is an awkward 17-year-old high school sophomore who hasn't known romance. But she's about to fall in love for the very first time with a man who isn't great with words. It's her history teacher, Mr Ito.(n)

programme.title: High Flash
programme.desc: Fisherman A-Hai is found dead by self-immolation during a protest led by newly-elected county Mayor Chen against Tonglian Petrochemical. The suspicious incident makes the headlines instantly.(n)

programme.title: Legend Of The Demon Cat
programme.desc: In the Tang Dynasty, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an City, causing a series of strange events. Poet Bai Letian and Monk Kukai join hands to investigate the death of Concubine Yang.(n)

programme.title: Ah Boys To Men 4
programme.desc: After leaving the military, Lobang, Wayang King, Sergeant Ong and Ken Chow are all busy with their respective careers as civilians. That is until they are called back to serve the nation.(n)

programme.title: Single Day
programme.desc: Being the eldest child in his family, Cheng En is born to be unlucky. His brother accidentally makes his colleague pregnant, thus he meets a wedding planner, who is an unlucky woman. What will happen from there?(n)

programme.title: Rookie Chef
programme.desc: Chi Ming runs off with his daughter after losing a custody battle with his late wife's father. Through a series of happenstances, they end up at the home of Chi Bao and her grandmother, who hail from a clan renowned for cooking.(n)

programme.title: Line Walker 2
programme.desc: After they uncover evidence that there is corruption in the police force, three police officers in Hong Kong try to discover which of them can be trusted.(n)

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: A girl ends up at an abandoned building while playing an augmented reality game. She wins the game and takes a photo to commemorate her win. Later, she realises there is a mysterious girl in the photo she has taken. Worse, the mystery girl is now haunting her.(n)

programme.title: This Is Not What I Expected
programme.desc: An obsessive CEO of a company meets a ragged chef by chance. They are drawn closer together because of their love for delicacies, yet their personalities clash big-time.(n)

programme.title: Deep Evil
programme.desc: A duo searches for clues to identify a headless victim, and they find it all pointing to a top plastic surgeon Kao.(n)

programme.title: Our Times
programme.desc: Lin Zhen Xin is a high-schooler who harbours a crush on her school's least ordinary, most adored boy Ouyang Fei Fan. After a chance encounter acquaints her with school ruffian Xi Tai Yu, she discovers that they have something in common: He has a crush on Fei Fan's female counterpart, Tao Min Min.(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong
programme.desc: Another gambling movie from Wong Jing, who combines the fun of kung fu and mahjong this time round!(n)

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: The story revolves around Xia Tian, a single mother and an associate researcher whose life's work is a machine that can allow people to return to the past. However, upon the completion of the machine, her son, Dou Dou, gets kidnapped and is held ransom in exchange for it.(n)

programme.title: Never Said Goodbye
programme.desc: Jun Hao is a Korean young man who immigrated to Italy with his elder sister when he was little. He accidentally sees the weeping Xiaoyou who had quarreled with her father, and the girl leaves a deep impression on him. On the campus of Language College, Jun Hao meets Xiaoyou again.(n)

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: A storm is heading to the city. A crew of seasoned criminals led by the notorious Nam, armed with high-powered weapons, pulls off another smooth and violent armored car heist in broad daylight in a crowded street.(n)

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: A girl ends up at an abandoned building while playing an augmented reality game. She wins the game and takes a photo to commemorate her win. Later, she realises there is a mysterious girl in the photo she has taken. Worse, the mystery girl is now haunting her.(n)

programme.title: House Of The Rising Sons
programme.desc: The musical biography of 1970s Hong Kong rock band The Wynners, starting with their humble beginnings as a band causing noise in the neighborhood, through to their career as massive stars throughout Asia.(n)

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a story of a woman who gives everything that she has to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past come hunting her.(n)

programme.title: The Tag-Along Devil Fish
programme.desc: Master Tiger, a Taoist god, seals a demon in the body of a fish. However, a small fish jumps out of the body and a boy brings it home. After that, a series of weird incidents happens.(n)

programme.title: The Menu
programme.desc: Following the events of the TV drama, Fong Ying has been promoted to interim chief editor and now has to deal with pressure to attract more online views and beat out an unscrupulous media rival. Meanwhile at a TV station, Tam sets off a bomb and demands a meeting with the Chief Executive.(n)

programme.title: The Outsiders
programme.desc: Pei Yu Yan is a good student at school, and keeps a low profile as if she is a canary in a cage. Ever since she meets Yu Hao, her life changes; he is the boy who impresses her.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor playboy finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago.(n)

programme.title: The Fortune Handbook
programme.desc: Su Fu, a good-for-nothing man tries to steal an age-old Chinese pastry recipe from his own brother-in-law in a bid to sell it and get rich. Things quickly take a turn when a God of Fortune sees his plan and decides to turn his life upside down.(n)

programme.title: Chasing The Dragon
programme.desc: An illegal immigrant from Mainland China sneaks into corrupt British-colonized Hong Kong in 1963, transforming himself into a ruthless and emerging drug lord.(n)

programme.title: Assassination
programme.desc: Yeom Seok-Jin is an agent from the interim government. He plans out an assassination plot and gives order to An Ok-Yoon. An Ok-Yoon is a deadly sniper and she works with Soksapo and Hwang Deok-Sam. She takes on the mission due to her strong desire to see Korea's independence.(n)

programme.title: Himalaya Singh
programme.desc: Singh is born and raised in the Himalayas. A naive yoga master, he is ordered by his parents to join a competition hosted by the King of Yoga to fight for the king's daughter. On his way, Singh meets Tally, who falls for him.(n)

programme.title: Code II
programme.desc: CODE is an omnipresent surveillance system that monitors every move humans make. The trio also discovers that "Lanli", the largest Technology Group in the city, seems to be connected to CODE.(n)

programme.title: The Left Ear
programme.desc: The Left Ear tells a painful love story of four teenagers. Seventeen-year-old LI'er is an introvert girl whose left ear suffers from poor hearing. One day, she suddenly expresses her love to Xu Ge who, however, becomes the boyfriend of an outgoing girl, Bala.(n)

programme.title: Marionette
programme.desc: A story about teenagers who live as someone's marionette before they normally go through the process of ego development or even think about moral values.(n)

programme.title: The Adventurers
programme.desc: The world's top thieves join forces to pull off the heist of a lifetime. But when they find themselves pursued across Europe by a legendary French detective, they'll have to take their game to the next level.(n)

programme.title: 50 First Kisses
programme.desc: Meeting the woman of your dreams in Hawaii is a blessing, until you discover she has short-term memory loss and forgets everything the very next day.(n)

programme.title: Lucid Dreams
programme.desc: An episodic film in which the director recounts four of his own dreams.(n)

programme.title: Saving Mr. Wu
programme.desc: An action-packed crime thriller based on the true story of China's famous celebrity kidnapping case. Mr. Wu is kidnapped in Beijing by Zhang Hua and three accomplices, all disguised as cops. In the ensuing 20 hours, Chinese detectives led by Chief Xing quickly form a task force to sweep the city.(n)

programme.title: The Merger
programme.desc: An ardent youth, Yip Ka Ka, heads her schoolmates to demonstrate against the demolition of the extraordinary school library. In spite of failure, her personality causes her to shift focus on the preservation of the valuable books together with her geek-looking teacher.(n)

programme.title: The Bravest Escort Group
programme.desc: This story takes place after the death of Wu Sangui. In order to send Chen Yuanyuan and her grandson to safety, a general commissions the help of the nation's best escort group to take on a mission of life and death.(n)

programme.title: Brother Of The Year
programme.desc: Jane lives with her brother Chut, with her being the only one doing everything around the house. But Chut will need to learn to take care of himself when Jane is about to get married and move to Japan.(n)

programme.title: Mojin: The Lost Legend
programme.desc: Seasoned grave robbers Hu Ba Yi, Wang Kai Xuan and Shirley Yang hail from a long line of tomb raiders, but the trio have decided to hang up their boots. They get lured back into their old trade by a mysterious businesswoman who offers Kai Xuan a large sum of money to locate an ancient tomb.(n)

programme.title: Haunted Hotel
programme.desc: A young couple enter a wrong hotel when they travel to Malaysia, and horrible things occur.(n)

programme.title: The Viral Factor
programme.desc: International Security Affairs agent Jon is on a dangerous mission to escort a criminal scientist to another country. En route, a member of his team, Sean, turns out to be a traitor and shoots Jon in the head while kidnapping the scientist.(n)

programme.title: Code II
programme.desc: Lee Yuan pays Ren-Jie a visit to seek assistance. She has been forced to serve as a watchdog for CODE after making her wish to save her son. As her true identity was exposed, she was kicked out.(n)

programme.title: Distance
programme.desc: Businessman Chen travels to Guangxi for work. During a site visit, he catches sight of his estranged father. The father he resents is now a crippled old man who doesn't recognise him.(n)

programme.title: Wonderful! Liang Xi Mei
programme.desc: Liang Xi Mei spends her time enjoying her retirement with her grandchildren and her two sons. The sons have grown up but still find themselves in unexpected trouble, and she will need to save her family.(n)

programme.title: 7 Years Of Night
programme.desc: A man dumps a girl's body in a lake after accidentally killing her with his car on a dark and foggy night. Her enraged father soon hatches an elaborate plan to find the perpetrator and take revenge.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Boy
programme.desc: Lucky Boy chronicles several decades of the lives of Lin Yu and Qingqing, the girl whom he fell in love with in primary school and continues pining for throughout his tumultuous and eventful life.(n)

programme.title: Poker King
programme.desc: Although Jack's family is involved in the casino business, he has never shared an interest in gaming until he played Texas Hold 'em on the Internet. Rival Uno is the manager at Randy's casino.(n)

programme.title: The Witness
programme.desc: Lu Xiao Xing is a rookie cop who goes to a night club to find her adoptive brother and bring him home to chastise him for getting expelled from school and pursuing a frivolous dream of being a singer. As they argue in the car, her brother sends the car flying off the overpass.(n)

programme.title: Heartfall Arises
programme.desc: An officer from the special forces faces the most notorious criminal who is a legend in Hong Kong for killing Southeast Asia's top businessmen.(n)

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of mercenaries come together to pull off an epic heist.(n)

programme.title: All's Well End's Well
programme.desc: The Yau brothers team up with fellow con-artists - the Lui sisters - to scam an infamous mob boss.(n)

programme.title: The Wailing
programme.desc: A series of mysterious deaths and illnesses takes place in an apparently peaceful village. The victims are thought to be killed by poisonous wild mushrooms, but police officer Jong Goo hears from the mysterious Moo Myung that a Japanese man is involved in the deaths.(n)

programme.title: Dream Flight
programme.desc: Chang Jia Hao has always wanted to fly. He enrolls in the Air Force Academy. Inspired by the story The Little Prince, Xin Yi also has a dream of flying. At a graduation party, the two idealistic youngsters meet and fall in love. But good times don't last long as Xin Yi discovers she's losing her eyesight.(n)

programme.title: Code II
programme.desc: To expose CODE's conspiracy, Ren-Jie, Zi-Hsin, Lee Yuan and Hank initiate joint investigations. It ends up in a deadlock due to CODE's countermeasures. They decide to kidnap the leader of Lanli Group.(n)

programme.title: Wu Yen
programme.desc: Emperor Qi, the male ruler of an ancient kingdom overrun by warring tribes, is set to marry the warrior-heroine Wu Yen when a mischievous, bisexual sorceress known as Yin Chun falls in love with both of them and begins meddling in their affairs.(n)

programme.title: The Mysterious Family
programme.desc: A young girl was raped by a weird stranger, and her parents and elder brothers were all killed months later. She survives and tries to find out the truth behind the massacre.(n)

programme.title: Agent Mr. Chan
programme.desc: A disgraced agent is forced to come back for one last undercover assignment.(n)

programme.title: To The Fore
programme.desc: A professional cycling team moves with speed and power. Race after race, the storied Radiant team, led by the brilliant Korean attacker Zheng Zhi Yuan, has become the virtual enemy of all cycling teams.(n)

programme.title: Cook Up A Storm
programme.desc: A Cantonese street cook and his chief rival, a French-trained Michelin-starred chef, discover they have a lot in common as they prepare for a world-famous culinary competition.(n)

programme.title: The Promise ()
programme.desc: Ib and Boum decide to commit suicide together in Bangkok in 1997. After reneging on her promise, the vengeful ghost of Ib returns 20 years later to haunt Boum and her 15-year-old daughter, Bell.(n)

programme.title: Wong Ka Yan
programme.desc: In 1992, youngster Chan Chun Yin starts a difficult quest to find Wong Ka Yan, a ticket taker at a local movie theatre whom he had fallen instantly in love with. Unfortunately, before Chun Yin could confess his love, Wong Ka Yan had quit her job and left without a trace.(n)

programme.title: Bad Genius
programme.desc: Lynn, a genius high school student who makes money by cheating in tests, receives a new task that leads her to set foot in Sydney, Australia. Lynn and her classmates have to deliver the test answers back.(n)

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: William Luk goes undercover as a prisoner to investigate correctional officers who are receiving bribes.(n)

programme.title: Get Outta Here
programme.desc: Lucky for everyone involved, Joe doesn't like to drink human blood, and he forms a bond with his new flat mates. However, other vampires do lurk in Hong Kong, and they soon side with the greedy land developers angling for Apple's flat.(n)

programme.title: The Priests
programme.desc: Two priests have to find out if a young girl was attacked by an evil spirit or human molester in order to save her life.(n)

programme.title: Assembly
programme.desc: A soldier fights to gain recognition for comrades who died during the Chinese Civil War.(n)

programme.title: Grey Met Shrek
programme.desc: Sometimes fairy tales don't turn out the way you expect. Grey is an office worker with a shopping addiction. One day, just after being fired, she sees a gorgeous pair of shoes. Before she fully understood what she was doing she's stolen the shoes, and in a bid to escape she climbs into a truck.(n)

programme.title: Code II
programme.desc: Lanli Group receives a "present". It is a timer which is counting down. News channels also start to report the detection of explosives all over the city. It suddenly faces the worst crisis in its history.(n)

programme.title: 7 Letters
programme.desc: 7 Letters represents seven heartfelt 'love letters' to Singapore, capturing each of the directors' personal and poignant connection with the place they call home.(n)

programme.title: Silent Voice
programme.desc: A young man is ostracised by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path of redemption.(n)

programme.title: Explosion
programme.desc: A blast technician in a mining town survives an explosion, only to discover it may not have been an accident. While investigating the truth, he becomes the prime suspect.(n)

programme.title: Back To The Good Times
programme.desc: This is a heart-warming story of a family that has a lot of issues financially, emotionally and physically, but is filled with humour.(n)

programme.title: Always Be With You
programme.desc: David, a taxi driver who is doomed with cancer, kills hotel owner Patrick in a car accident. Patrick's girlfriend takes over his hotel by the lake in Hong Kong, where it is haunted by serial suicidal incidents later.(n)

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: The PLA Navy Marine Corps launch a hostage rescue operation in Ihwea and undergo a fierce battle with rebellions and terrorism.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Mr. Loser ()
programme.desc: Goodbye Mr Loser is a film about a middle-aged nobody who passes out drunk and magically travels back to his school days.(n)

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: A girl ends up at an abandoned building while playing an augmented reality game. She wins the game and takes a photo to commemorate her win. Later, she realises there is a mysterious girl in the photo she has taken. Worse, the mystery girl is now haunting her.(n)

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Kill Mobile tells the story of seven long-time friends who play a party game in which everyone hands over their phones to reveal all their calls, texts and WeChat messages, opening a Pandora's box in the room.(n)

programme.title: My Little Sentimental Friend
programme.desc: Having been dumped by his wife, Eric Tsang moves into his friend's home and falls for his friend's wife.(n)

programme.title: The Law Enforcer
programme.desc: Police officer Kent spots a robbery and rescues a girl, Anna. Kent also hurts gangster Bad Brain when saving a taxi driver. Bad Brain joins mobster Tiger in a jewellery robbery. He meets Anna again and injures her. He also kills Kent's fellow officer. Kent vows to catch Bad Brain.(n)

programme.title: Will Of Iron
programme.desc: Maggie returns to Hong Kong to accompany her grandmother to Canada. She takes the opportunity to visit her old friends Carol and Jacky. Little does she know that Jacky has become a drug addict. More surprisingly, the drug dealer is Maggie's boyfriend, Michael.(n)

programme.title: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Two cute kids plot to reunite parents Sam Hui and Olivia Cheng.(n)

programme.title: In The Line Of Duty 4
programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop and two American cops are onto a suspected harbour worker and are forced to team up when they discover that the suspect is a witness on the run from CIA agents and their schemers, two corrupt cops.(n)

programme.title: Fruit Punch
programme.desc: Hacken and his friends run their business but fail repeatedly. Even with a rich man's support, the business and his romance are still at stake.(n)

programme.title: Working Class
programme.desc: A factory worker falls in love unknowingly with his boss' daughter. However, on their first date, he vows never to marry a rich girl.(n)

programme.title: Jiang Hu- The Triad Zone
programme.desc: The word is out on the streets - someone will assassinate underworld kingpin Jimmy Yam in the next 24 hours. Jimmy gets a chance to see the people around him as who they really are.(n)

programme.title: Fatal Love
programme.desc: A romantic thriller with lovers Leslie Cheung and Cherie Chung facing death at the hands of her gangster ex-boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: The Unmatchable Match
programme.desc: Ruthless gangster Shing Fui-On pulls off a daring and violent heist of diamonds. He then enlists the aid of longtime triad member Chan Wai-Man to arrange a buyer for them.(n)

programme.title: A Hearty Response
programme.desc: Kong-sang is a mainland Chinese girl who illegally enters Hong Kong, hoping to retrieve her birth certificate which proves that she was actually born in Hong Kong. She flees from her smuggler Shing after she injures him.(n)

programme.title: Love Is Love
programme.desc: Shi Jinshui and Wu Daidi are childhood sweethearts. They elope from their hometown and live in the urban city, where Jinshui falls in love with his superior and breaks up with his wife Daidi. Later, Jinshui finds himself still in love with Daidi and decides to find his beloved wife.(n)

programme.title: A Bite Of Love
programme.desc: Duke Lee is a world-weary vampire who's given up on attacking human beings and concerns himself with finding alternatives to his former blood-sucking exploits. He meets Anna, a triad boss' daughter who seeks out Duke Lee to use his blood as a potential life-saving elixir for her father.(n)

programme.title: Long Arm Of The Law 2
programme.desc: Suspecting that a mastermind is behind a sudden crime wave, the Royal Hong Kong Police Force sends in three undercover cops to bust the crime ring.(n)

programme.title: Why Me
programme.desc: Fat Cat is an intellectually-disabled man who endures the mistreatment of the local villagers. Koko, an idealistic social worker, tries to give Fat Cat a better life. Her battle against apathy on his behalf takes its toll on them both.(n)

programme.title: Sworn Brothers
programme.desc: A tough look at the Hong Kong underworld with Andy Lau and Cheung Kwok-keung, two pals who stand on different sides of the law.(n)

programme.title: It's A Drink! It's A Bomb
programme.desc: An explosives expert builds a new-fangled bomb that's disguised as a can of cola. He sells it to evil Japanese terrorists Eddy Ko and Tsui Kam-Kong, but not before his assistant absconds with the cola. During the ensuing chase, three mismatched strangers are brought together.(n)

programme.title: Yes, Madam
programme.desc: Asprin and Strepsil are two petty thieves who inadvertently become involved in a murder case when they steal items belonging to a murdered man. The man had hidden an important microfilm in his passport, which the thieves pass on to a forger friend Panadol.(n)

programme.title: Pa Pa Loves You
programme.desc: Ying is a single parent who's having a tough time disciplining his wild daughter Ellen. When Ying is mistaken to be the famous gangster hero, he gains recognition among Ellen's gangster classmates.(n)

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China III
programme.desc: Wong Fei Hung visits Beijing during a competition designed to determine which group has the best lion dancers.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Diamond
programme.desc: Anita Mui reluctantly shares office space with private eye Alex in a comedy of gangsters, insurance fraud and diamonds.(n)

programme.title: A Chinese Ghost Story
programme.desc: After experiencing a string of bad luck, a debt collector spends the night in a haunted temple, where he encounters a ravishing female ghost and battles to save her soul from the control of a wicked tree demon.(n)

programme.title: Love On A Diet
programme.desc: Mimi Mo is an exchange student in Japan who fell in love with budding pianist Kurokawa. Kurokawa later leaves to study in the USA and returns to Japan as a famous musician. Mimi has dealt with her depression by eating and now weighs over 300 pounds. Mimi meets Fatty who helps her lose weight.(n)

programme.title: The Hitman
programme.desc: Fu is an ex-solider adept at kung-fu fighting. When a triad discovers Fu's fighting prowess, they entreat the gentle tough guy to help score a $100-million bounty placed on the "King of Assassins". But hitmen of all shapes and sizes appear to claim the reward for themselves!(n)

programme.title: Life After Life
programme.desc: Wooden puppets linked to an old murder turn out to have a weird connection with designer George Lam and model Flora Cheung.(n)

programme.title: Aces Go Places
programme.desc: King Kong is a burglar who makes off with a fortune in diamonds. Inspector "Hot Tongue" Ho leads the Hong Kong cops in apprehending him, but the higher-ups call in legendary detective Kodojak, who charms Ho and persuades King Kong to partner them to take down evil jewel thief White Glove.(n)

programme.title: Once A Thief
programme.desc: Three orphans are taken in by a wealthy crime boss. The trio grow up learning high-tech methods of theft and specialising in stealing treasured paintings.(n)

programme.title: Rosa
programme.desc: Hsia and Lei Kung are two bumbling cops assigned to protect the gorgeous Rosa, girlfriend to a missing informer named Lee. But Rosa is wanted by more than just the law - the bad guys want her for leverage, and Lei Kung just wants her to be his girlfriend!(n)

programme.desc: Kin Seng has a goal to be in the upper class of society, but he falls into big debts in the gambling house. So he persuades his loving wife, May, to embezzle a huge sum from work to save him. In order to repay the sum, they go to Thailand to seek help from Kin Seng's uncle but in vain.(n)

programme.title: Pink Bomb
programme.desc: A bunch of Hong Kong residents go on a bus tour to Thailand and get mixed up with counterfeiters who are chasing an underage hooker who stole their bogus loot.(n)

programme.title: Games Gamblers Play
programme.desc: Petty conmen Michael and Sam Hui try every scheme imaginable to make a fortune through gambling, with hilarious results.(n)

programme.title: I Love Maria
programme.desc: The Apollo Gang controls a giant robot to commit robbery. Al decides to leave the evil gang and is traced by fem-bot Maria.(n)

programme.title: Iron Monkey
programme.desc: The film follows the exploits of Dr. Yang, a kind physician who spends his days tending to the sick, but leaves his evenings open to right wrongs in the guise of the shadowy Iron Monkey. The beautiful Orchid assists the hero in both his identities.(n)

programme.title: The Champions
programme.desc: Country boy Lee Tong has the knack of getting into trouble with great regularity. This time, he has to beat it all the way to the city, and the first thing that happens to him in the city is to have his pocket picked.(n)

programme.title: Finale In Blood
programme.desc: Fruit Chan makes his directorial debut with this intriguing mixture of horror, farce and sex involving a DJ and a beautiful ghost.(n)

programme.title: Tiger On Beat
programme.desc: Michael Chao, young and agile, is a new recruit in the police force. Francis Lee, an experienced cop, is lazy and frivolous. They are assigned to work on a murder case. Because of some misunderstanding and clash of personalities, the two are caught in a series of hilarious situations.(n)

programme.title: Gimme Gimme
programme.desc: A group of high school students are wise beyond their years regarding sex and drugs, yet tenderly innocent when it comes to matters of the heart.(n)

programme.title: To Err Is Humane
programme.desc: A comedy of errors ensues when Sammo Hung tries to kidnap his boss but ends up with Joey Wang, who is then snatched by Kenny Bee.(n)

programme.title: All The Wrong Clues
programme.desc: A private investigator and a police inspector team up to pursue a notorious mobster who is plotting to milk an old millionaire. The investigator crosses paths with a femme fatale and silly gangsters.(n)

programme.title: Black Cat
programme.desc: Jade Leung is explosive as the Hong Kong equivalent of La Femme Nikita, a sleek killing machine who yearns to start a new life.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: The vampire poison inside Mei Loi breaks out during the trip in Japan. Mei Loi will turn into a vampire soon. Siu Ling hides the truth from Jan Jan in case she freaks out.(n)

programme.title: Four Loves
programme.desc: Nina Li, Pauline Wong, Carina Lau and Crystal Kwok become sworn sisters in this nostalgic drama set in 1950s Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Sister Cupid
programme.desc: Dodo Cheng plays cupid for brother Jacky Cheung by fixing him up with Maggie Cheung, who turns out to be not quite human.(n)

programme.title: Set Up
programme.desc: Moon, a writer, is about to marry a businessman. Before her wedding day, she undergoes an eye surgery, which causes her blindness for three days. While she stays in her new house with her sister Yan, she experiences the real pre-marital anxiety when three robbers break into her house!(n)

programme.title: The Bachelor's Swan Song
programme.desc: Kenny and Maggie, lovers of long standing, have been scrimping and saving for their marriage. One day Maggie suspects that she is pregnant, and suggests an early wedding. Kenny is thunderstruck as he has just lost his every cent in the stock market.(n)

programme.desc: Ching is a prisoner in a Hong Kong jail that has a large population of Mainland Chinese prisoners. Ching escapes to see his young son. He surrenders himself to authorities, but the vengeful chief of security, Zau, arranges for Ching to be set up by the Mainland gang, led by the affable Dragon.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Scoundrels
programme.desc: Valentino is a mediocre con-artist who crosses paths with Kwan, a fellow con-artist. Together, they impersonate various people and create numerous schemes to make money. Meanwhile, gangsters are making a scheme of their own.(n)

programme.title: Cop Busters
programme.desc: Big Bear and Big Mouth were raised in the same orphanage. They were assigned to tow cars by their division commander, but on the first day of their assignment they mistakenly pick up a little girl.(n)

programme.desc: When her unruly son is kidnapped by gangsters after accidentally witnessing a hit, a desperate mother convinces her two old flames that the boy might belong to either of them, and persuades them to help her find him.(n)

programme.title: How To Be A Billionaire
programme.desc: Raymond Wong is a country bumpkin who learns the secret to fame and fortune, but finds that being rich isn't all it's cracked up to be.(n)

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: The story takes place on a deserted island inhabited by only one family, a mother and her three sons.(n)

programme.title: The Return Of Pom Pom
programme.desc: Two detectives and best buddies investigate how the inspector is framed by a master thief. They accidentally meet the thief's daughter.(n)

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow III
programme.desc: A prequel to A Better Tomorrow, Chow Yun-Fat stars as a younger Mark on a mission to get a friend out of Vietnam. He runs up against Ho, a local crime lord. Along the way he also meets Kit, a female gangster who helps the naive young Mark become a highly-capable gunman.(n)

programme.title: Fearless Hyena II
programme.desc: Jackie Chan hides in the mountains to avoid his enemies.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Fan Yan is demoted to director. He asks Siu Ling for help as something strange happens during work. Domoto Sei surrenders himself to Tin Yau. He explains that everything he does is for Mei Loi.(n)

programme.desc: The No. 1 box office hit of 1977, Ducky is hired by Rich Chen to transport the "diamonds" he stole. Uncles Tough Guy and Mary would like to get the diamonds from Ducky, so they volunteer to relieve Ducky of his responsibility.(n)

programme.desc: Nat Chan is a gambler who gives it all up for his anti-gambling fiancee Joyce Godenzi, but her gambling dad has other ideas.(n)

programme.title: Scared Stiff
programme.desc: A thriller about a man who has the ability to read people's dreams after a serious car accident. He uses his gift to help the police to solve a murder.(n)

programme.title: When Fortune Smiles
programme.desc: The head of a rich family dies and in his will leaves his fortune to his daughter. His son is enraged and uses a rubbish collector who resembles his sister to steal the fortune.(n)

The mysterious chemical company hires lawyer Jackie Lung to find information that will discredit the fishery. He employs his friend Wong to woo the fishery owner, Miss Yip, to convince her to settle out of court.(n)

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Sally Yeh stars as Angie, a Canadian college student who travels to Hong Kong to work on her thesis about supersitions in China. Low on cash, she seem to have lucked out in finding a luxury apartment for a pittance, until she fins out that the flat's former occupant is haunting it.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Mammie
programme.desc: After her husband's death, Sally works and educates her 10-year-old son Andy. One day, Sally is found to have leukemia and has only six months to live.(n)

programme.title: A Man Called Hero
programme.desc: This story follows Hero Hua from an ill-omened June day in his youth to a showdown 17 years later with a disaffected member of his martial arts school, a Japanese named Invincible.(n)

programme.desc: Interpol Director Cao is collecting evidence of a mad scientist who is suspected to be the manufacturer of drugs. At a night club show, he encounters Shi Chun, who is invited to visit the container ship of the mad scientist.(n)

Just as Hui reaches out to his father, the Hong Kong CID conclude their years-long effort to get the goods on Tung and his associates.(n)

programme.title: Lost In Time
programme.desc: Sui Wai lost her fiance Ah Man in a car accident. With the obligations of life sitting heavy on her shoulders, she lives on. Dai Fai, a driver who witnessed Ah Man's death, is always there offering her support, yet he also lives in the shadow of his last relationship.(n)

programme.title: One Husband Too Many

programme.desc: Ann returns from US and is advised by her rich father to live by herself. She works at a florist and falls for Ball, who is not wealthy.(n)

programme.desc: A brilliant but undiscovered, disabled cartoonist is frustrated at his job, but he meets a nice girl and successfully expresses his love in his cartoons.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Girls

programme.title: The Young Master
programme.desc: Defeated in a Lion Dance competition, Dragon leaves the Red School in disgrace to look for his treacherous brother.(n)

programme.desc: Flower of Evil special episode- a recap of previous episodes and behind-the-scenes that fans cannot miss!(n)
